Courses.title: JavaScript for Beginners
Courses.description: An introductory course to JavaScript, covering the basics of programming in the browser.
Courses.instruction: Learn the fundamentals of JavaScript step-by-step with practical examples and exercises.

Courses.title: Advanced React Development
Courses.description: Take your React skills to the next level with this deep dive into hooks, state management, and advanced patterns.
Courses.instruction: Master React development by building complex applications and using modern techniques.

Courses.title: Python for Data Science
Courses.description: Learn Python and its libraries to analyze and visualize data. Perfect for aspiring data scientists.
Courses.instruction: Gain hands-on experience in Python programming and data analysis through real-world projects.

Courses.title: Web Development Bootcamp
Courses.description: A comprehensive bootcamp covering HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and more to get you started as a web developer.
Courses.instruction: Follow along with expert instructors to build websites from scratch and become a proficient web developer.

Courses.title: Introduction to Machine Learning
Courses.description: A beginner-friendly course that teaches the fundamentals of machine learning using Python.
Courses.instruction: Discover the core concepts of machine learning and build predictive models using real datasets.
